11th drink-drive conviction: Motueka orchard worker walks out on judge who sent him to prison https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/motueka-orchard-worker-walks-out-on-judge-who-sent-him-to-prison-on-11th-drink-drive-offence/PLBSKZWBINFFJDX3FOXW5ZBIFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/motueka-orchard-worker-walks-out-on-judge-who-sent-him-to-prison-on-11th-drink-drive-offence/PLBSKZWBINFFJDX3FOXW5ZBIFY/ Tracy Neal'You have no insight into the harm you could cause to others,' the judge said. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 08:00:00 +0000 Richard Cane's 11th conviction for drink driving happened after he crashed his motorbike into a car that pulled out in front of him. Photo / 123RF
Aircraft makes emergency landing at Invercargill after flames seen coming from engine over Queenstown, witnesses heard loud bangs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/flames-seen-coming-from-aircraft-over-queenstown/5MCVT7B6SBGHDI32SBBDXWXE5E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/flames-seen-coming-from-aircraft-over-queenstown/5MCVT7B6SBGHDI32SBBDXWXE5E/ The aircraft has just made an emergency landing at Invercargill Airport. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:57:00 +0000 Flames were seen coming from an aircraft this evening over Queenstown.
Thieves target Christchurch power lines: Police appeal for information after copper raid https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thieves-target-christchurch-power-lines-police-appeal-for-information-after-copper-raid/JLZQMTXHO5FRZFJSW3BM7WMS3I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thieves-target-christchurch-power-lines-police-appeal-for-information-after-copper-raid/JLZQMTXHO5FRZFJSW3BM7WMS3I/ Recent incidents have hit areas close to schools, preschools and homes. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:41:48 +0000 A spate of power line thefts and tampering across Christchurch is concerning police. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Taranaki mattress murder trial: Fire investigator says victim was unconscious when fire broke out https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-trial-fire-investigator-says-victim-was-unknown-when-fire-broke-out/JSPXH7CC4BBBDDYWLVUGOTIKEE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-trial-fire-investigator-says-victim-was-unknown-when-fire-broke-out/JSPXH7CC4BBBDDYWLVUGOTIKEE/ Tara ShaskeyEmma Field was alive but likely unconscious when the fire took hold. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:16:05 +0000 Emma Field's body was found following a fire that ripped through her New Plymouth flat on May 27, 2022. Now, her partner Leigh Matthew Frederick Beer is on trial for her alleged murder.
Woman denies knowledge of secret methamphetamine lab; buried buckets of cannabis https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-denies-knowledge-of-secret-methamphetamine-lab-buried-buckets-of-cannabis/Y4FXFILVDNEV7O5CTARWWNCHFU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-denies-knowledge-of-secret-methamphetamine-lab-buried-buckets-of-cannabis/Y4FXFILVDNEV7O5CTARWWNCHFU/ Hannah BartlettA woman says she and her partner had nothing to do with a meth lab. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:00:00 +0000 The Crown has pointed to a diarised shopping list that included lidded buckets and green and black spray paint, and suggests it links a woman to a hidden cannabis and a clandestine lab.
Missing Marokopa man Tom Phillips’ eldest child to celebrate birthday on the run https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-man-tom-phillips-eldest-child-to-celebrate-birthday-on-the-run/RQDOV45CNBFBRDKGUC4SGNVE2M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-marokopa-man-tom-phillips-eldest-child-to-celebrate-birthday-on-the-run/RQDOV45CNBFBRDKGUC4SGNVE2M/ Raphael FranksEldest daughter Jayda reaches the milestone as attention on her father ramps up. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Tom Phillips' daughter Jayda was 8 years old when the family went missing. His son Maverick was 7 and his youngest daughter Ember was 5. Jayda’s birthday is June 18, police say. Composite photo / NZME
Brian Baldwin sentenced for stabbing Auckland Transit bus driver at Mt Roskill stop https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/brian-baldwin-sentenced-for-stabbing-auckland-transit-bus-driver-at-mt-roskill-stop/ZAPBSURMRBGZNHXFRMLVOWF6SU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/brian-baldwin-sentenced-for-stabbing-auckland-transit-bus-driver-at-mt-roskill-stop/ZAPBSURMRBGZNHXFRMLVOWF6SU/ Craig KapitanThe serial stabber also attacked a man at Auckland Hospital, resulting in kidney loss. Ranfurly Shield fever freebie in Hastings next weekhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/ranfurly-shield-fever-freebie-in-hastings-next-week/EOXS4OQLWJAN5HEQWBJIEVUEBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/ranfurly-shield-fever-freebie-in-hastings-next-week/EOXS4OQLWJAN5HEQWBJIEVUEBM/ Doug LaingGeneral admission for the June 26 Shield match is free. It costs to sit in the grandstand. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 06:18:23 +0000 The Ranfurly Shield's belated arrival in Hawke's Bay last month, the precursor to a new season of Shield fever with a defence at the Regional Sports Park on June 26, the first Ranfurly Shield match in Hastings since 1926. Photo / Paul Taylor
